definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The two promoted the film at the Cannes Film Festival that spring.
sentences.chinese: 那个春天，两人将这部电影带到了戛纳电影节上。

sentences.english: This film won Golden Bear at the 57th Berlin International Film Festival in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 本片获第57届柏林电影节最佳影片金熊奖。

sentences.english: The First International Deaf Film Festival is coming soon.
sentences.chinese: 第一届香港国际聋人电影节即将开锣。

sentences.english: When it premiered at this year's Edinburgh film festival, I paid for Vanessa to fly over.
sentences.chinese: 在爱丁堡电影节首映的时候，我邀请了瓦妮莎参加。

sentences.english: The film also stars Cannes best actor winner Tony Leung Chiu-wai and Chinese newcomer Tang Wei.
sentences.chinese: 主演还有嘎纳电影节影帝梁朝伟和中国青年演员汤唯。

sentences.english: Binoche held up Panahi's name in protest at Cannes.
sentences.chinese: 比诺什在嘎纳电影节还提出他的名字表示了抗议。

sentences.english: My host family is taking me over to an Indian film festival next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 下周末，我的房东要带我去参加印度电影节。

sentences.english: This year’s festival was held June 16-23. For more details, see the Silverdocs Web site.
sentences.chinese: 今年电影节于6月16日至23日举行。

sentences.english: Who can we expect to see on the Croisette this year?
sentences.chinese: 今年戛纳电影节我们能看到哪些明星？

sentences.english: This year, Bill is attending the Sundance Film Festival for thefirst time.
sentences.chinese: 今年，比尔第一次参加圣得西电影节。

sentences.english: For this movie he was given the Silver Berlin Bear Award for Best Actor.
sentences.chinese: 他因此片而荣获柏林电影节最佳男演员银熊奖。

sentences.english: This film won Golden Bear at the57th Berlin International Film Festival in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 本片获第57届柏林电影节最佳影片金熊奖。

sentences.english: Last year, the award went to young director Li Yu.
sentences.chinese: 去年，这个电影节的奖项颁给了年轻的女导演李玉。

sentences.english: A Son’s Sacrifice won the Silverdocs audience award for short films.
sentences.chinese: 《儿子的献祭》获得本届银城电影节短片观众奖。

sentences.english: My short film is about to hit the festival circuit.
sentences.chinese: 我的电影短片即将在电影节上映了。

sentences.english: Her film was premiered in Cannes Festival.
sentences.chinese: 她的影片在戛纳电影节首次放映。

definition: Golden Horse Film Festival and Awards
to premiere (a movie or TV show)/premiere (of a movie)/first-run (movie)/to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: Golden Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival
Golden Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival
Silver Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival

pinyin: ping2 shen3 tuan2 te4 bie2 jiang3
